name: Clemens was here
comment: This is one of the best speeches I have ever heard. Seriously !

name: pure Joy
comment: It‘s unbelievable how much we underestimate this smart, blonde actress.

name: Christina Taft
comment: This is AMAZING! I love Amber Heard and what she does. Also, I completely agree. Journalism, activism, allowing people to speak for causes on social media, and human rights are important!
